title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of the software, there is an issue with the popup menu not appearing in the java editor ruler.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, the expected popup menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc. does not appear.
EB: The software should display a popup menu when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a java editor 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler 
Expected: A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc. 
Actual: The popup menu does not appear.
